licence.p: The Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) Licence applies to this document.

This licence applies to this TEI-XML document which is the transformed result work from a previous LaTEX format file out of the synoptic diplomatic edition of the complete poemes of Ausiàs March in all its witnesses.
The licence was added on May 1, 2020.

msIdentifier.repository: Biblioteca Virtual Lluís Vives - Cervantes Virtual

msItem.rubric: 163r centre, before first line Moß Mossen auzias march

editorialDecl.p: This a TEI-XML adaptation out of the LaTEX version of Ausiàs March’s poems’ synoptic edition, from all witnesses.

div.note: Esta cobla esta tota borrada per error perques de la obra Callen aquells, la que esta a cartes Dcvi.

lg.l: Puix mon affany / en entre totsprimeruix mon affany / en entre totsprimer
amor fa tort / com se rete mondretamor fa tort / com se rete mondret
als falts e epechs / no dona fam ni setals falts e epechs / no dona fam ni set
ne fret necalt / tots ancomplit mesterne fret necalt / tots ancomplit meste
Car no es hu / que no trob tot son altCar no es hu / que no trob tot son alt
merçe auent / si james lademana merçe auent / si james lademana
eyo damor / visch desperança vanaeyo damor / visch desperança vana
si pens auer / raho de serne calt si pens auer / raho de serne calt
